name: ai-pipeline
description: This Azure DevOps task streamlines pipeline debugging by integrating an AI log analysis system. It analyzes error logs, providing context-specific hints for swift issue resolution, empowering developers in optimizing their pipeline workflows.
author: Serviceware

inputs.name: openAiApiKey
inputs.label: Open AI API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: A valid Open AI API key to access the Open AI API.

inputs.name: projectId
inputs.label: Project ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the project to which the pipeline belongs.

inputs.name: buildId
inputs.label: Build ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the run of the pipeline.

inputs.name: azureToken
inputs.label: Azure Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: A valid Azure token to access the Azure DevOps API.

inputs.name: azureHost
inputs.label: Azure Host
inputs.helpMarkDown: The host of the Azure DevOps instance.
